title: Don’t travel abroad before checking out this Rosetta Stone deal
text:
The AAPicks team writes about things we think you’ll like, and we may see a share of revenue from any purchases made through affiliate links. 

I think we can all agree regardless of politics that there’s a lot of weirdness going on in the world right now.
As a result, thousands of people who had previously elected to live and die in their hometowns are tinkering with the possibility of taking a jaunt through foreign lands. 
There’s only one major wall many of them are facing.
The language barrier. 
Fortunately, in honor of this uptick in international travel interest, Rosetta Stone has put their highest rated sets on sale! 
That’s right, today and tomorrow you can get the Spanish , French , Italian , or English Level 1-4 boxed sets for 34 percent off! 
Since this critically acclaimed language learning software normally costs $229.00 , that brings your grand total to just $149.99 .
But traveling isn’t the only reason to pick up a new language. Studies show that bilingual people are regarded as more intelligent by their peers across the board, are more than twice as likely to be selected for a job over single-language candidates with similar credentials, and make substantially more money on average than single-language speakers.

Rosetta Stone is considered the gold standard in mastering a new language. Its intuitive, immersive method of teaching has drawn high praise from the Wall Street Journal , CNET , CNN , and PC Mag .
The versatile, platform spanning system lets you learn on the go during your idle time thanks to the mobile app , and the language games are as fun as they are informative. Expand your mind, increase your value as a job candidate, and travel without feeling like a silly tourist .
Rosetta Stone in a Glance: Learn a new language w/ the award-winning interactive software & proprietary speech-recognition technology that analyzes the words you say 100 times per second Develop your command of the language–read, write, speak & understand Learn basic conversational skills like shopping, ordering, taking a taxi, etc. Move onto advanced language skills like sharing opinions & discussing pop culture Enhance your learning on-the-go w/ Rosetta Stone mobile apps (3-month trial included) Play language-enhancing games & take live online lessons w/ the included headset/microphone Take levels 1-4 to go from beginner to advanced Use the advanced speech engine to compare your accent to native speakers Get 12 live tutoring sessions w/ a native speaker Ready to get your globetrot on?
